title: Fiji's HIV cases surge due to bluetoothing, chemsex and needle-sharing
description: The small South Pacific nation is facing one of the world's fastest growing HIV epidemics.
content:
Ten: that's the age of the youngest person with HIV that Sesenieli Naitala has ever met.
When she first started Fiji's Survivor Advocacy Network in 2013, that young boy was yet to be born. Now he is one of thousands of Fijians to have contracted the ... [7321 chars]

title: Syria holds first elections since Assad, but not in all provinces
description: Three provinces will not be included "for security reasons", amid concerns over how representative the polls will be.
content:
Syria will hold its first parliamentary elections on Sunday since the fall of Bashar al-Assad, amid concerns over inclusivity and successive delays.
There will be no direct vote for the People's Assembly, which will be responsible for legislation dur... [4794 chars]

title: Home Secretary Mahmood and Tory leader Badenoch face questions from Laura Kuenssberg
description: The home secretary is appearing on the show days after the deadly Manchester synagogue attack.
content:
Home secretary says Manchester investigation progressing 'at pace'
Kuenssberg asks Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood for updates on those in custody for the Manchester synagogue attack.

title: Dramatic footage of 'arson attack' at Mosque as police investigate hate crime

title: Greta Thunberg abused: Sumud Flotilla activists recount ‘Israeli’ abuse during detention
description: Greta Thunberg walks with a crowd that arrived to greet the Global Sumud Flotilla (GSF) at the port of Sidi Bou Said before it had set sail.
content:
Deported activists from the Global Sumud Flotilla, a humanitarian aid convoy bound for Gaza, have said ‘Israeli’ forces subjected them to violent and degrading treatment following the vessels' interception in international waters.
